sn_cmp_cloud_template.body: AWSTemplateFormatVersion: 2010-09-09 Description: >- AWS CloudFormation Template ACE-MSP-Monitoring-VMs-v1: A Template for provisioning the Monitoring VMs for the MSP Stack used in the ACE ITOM End To End Demo. **WARNING** This template creates 3 Amazon EC2 instances. You will be billed for the AWS resources used if you create a stack from this template.
